roleset.name: give up (to)
roleset.note: FORFEIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'forfeit' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from forfeit.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually without benefactive
example.text: In addition, Mrs. Lidgerwood said, Norfolk-1 is likely *trace*-1 to draw down its cash initially to finance the purchases and thus forfeit some interest income.

example.name: all args
example.text: John forfeited his prize collection of bottle caps to Mary.
example.arg: his prize collection of bottle caps
